name: ROLE OF THE DICE (Brevillo)
description:
Welcome to Role of the Dice!

In Role of the Dice you play as an adventurous  young dice trying to survive in a dark fantasy world. Use your different ROLES to help you survive against an onslaught of vicious monsters. Different ROLES will have different stats and abilities.

Controls:

  • Move the player using the arrow keys.
  • Roll the dice using the WASD keys to change ROLES
  • Press space to you current ROLE's ability
  • Press escape to exit the app

Credits

  • Art and programming by me in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022
  • Sound effects from freesound.org

This is my first game jam game, so I'd appreciate as much feedback as you can give me!
